endGoal: Render every LilyPond MusicXML test fixture with zero unexpected parse or render failures, then keep visual baselines stable in CI.
categoryStatusSemantics: categoryStatus tracks seeded demo-page coverage only. Conformance completion is derived from active fixture counts in fixtures/conformance/lilypond/*.meta.yaml.

seedDemos.title: LilyPond 01a: Pitches
seedDemos.description: All diatonic and accidental pitch spellings in a compact baseline fixture.

seedDemos.title: LilyPond 01c: No Voice Element
seedDemos.description: Single-note fixture that verifies optional <voice> parsing plus lyric rendering.

seedDemos.title: LilyPond 02a: Rests Durations
seedDemos.description: Duration ladder for rests used to validate rest glyph mapping and spacing.

seedDemos.title: LilyPond 03a: Rhythm Durations
seedDemos.description: Rhythmic duration matrix used as an early readability sanity check.

seedDemos.title: LilyPond 11a: Time Signatures
seedDemos.description: Representative meter changes and signatures for staff-attribute verification.

seedDemos.title: LilyPond 13a: Key Signatures
seedDemos.description: Major/minor signature transitions for accidental state and rendering checks.

seedDemos.title: LilyPond 61a: Lyrics
seedDemos.description: Baseline lyric syllable alignment and text placement fixture.

seedDemos.title: LilyPond 71g: Multiple Chord Names
seedDemos.description: Harmony-heavy fixture with multiple chord changes over sustained notes.
